short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Toggle between HTTP and HTTPS for the current tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
HTTP/HTTPS Switcher is a simple and useful Chrome extension that allows you to quickly change the URL of your current tab from HTTP to HTTPS or HTTPS to HTTP. Ideal for secure web browsing and web developers!

 Features:
- Easy to Use: Just click the plugin icon to change the URL of your current tab from HTTP to HTTPS or HTTPS to HTTP.
- Fast Switch:** Switch quickly with just one click, save time.

For Who?
- Web Developers: You can easily switch HTTP/HTTPS in local development or test environments.
- High Security Conscious Users:** Check whether the sites you visit use secure connections and switch if necessary.

How to use?
1. Download and install the extension from the Chrome Web Store.
2. Switch the URL of the current tab from HTTP to HTTPS or HTTPS to HTTP by clicking the plugin icon in the browser toolbar.
3. The plugin icon will change according to the current URL protocol: Green for HTTPS, red for HTTP.

Experience a more secure and flexible web browsing experience with the HTTP/HTTPS Switcher plugin!
